name: Purposely
description: For advertisers that grapple with $100M in wasted ad spend per year, Purposely.ai helps them reclaim that waste by automating the analysis and production of ad creatives using artificial intelligence.
one_liner: For advertisers that grapple with $100M in wasted ad spend per year, Purposely.ai helps them reclaim that waste by automating the analysis and production of ad creatives using artificial intelligence.
